trans-unit.source: Represents a proposed addition of an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> to a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"></xref> within a running workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma proposta adição de um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> para um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"> </xref> dentro de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho em execução.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.AddedActivityAction"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.AddedActivityAction"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.AddedActivityAction"></xref> class by using a specified activity and composite activity.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.AddedActivityAction"> </xref> classe utilizando uma atividade especificada e a atividade composta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"></xref> that the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.AddedActivityAction"></xref> is based on.

trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> adicionado ao fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: compositeActivity or activityAdded are a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: compositeActivityou activityAdded são uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> added to the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> adicionado ao fluxo de trabalho.
O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> adicionado ao fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the added <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*> collection of the parent <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice da adicionado <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> com o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*>coleção do principal <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"> </xref>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*>

trans-unit.source: The index value of the new <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor de índice da nova <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>.
